Divine Deflection.name: Divine Deflection
Divine Deflection.flavor: Your sword disrupts the dragon’s breath, sending it everywhere but at your friends.
Divine Deflection.trigger: An enemy within reach makes a close attack that includes at least one ally
Divine Deflection.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally in the target’s close attack gains a power bonus to all defenses against the attack equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

Dragon Flame Sacrifice.name: Dragon Flame Sacrifice
Dragon Flame Sacrifice.flavor: You shield your ally from the searing flames of the dragon’s breath.
Dragon Flame Sacrifice.trigger: An ally within the burst is targeted by a close burst attack that does not include you
Dragon Flame Sacrifice.effect: You and the target exchange spaces. You gain a +2 power bonus to defenses against the attack.

Beast-Punishing Strike.name: Beast-Punishing Strike
Beast-Punishing Strike.flavor: Your weapon not only crushes bone and parts flesh, but delivers a tiny seed of energy that takes root within your enemy’s soul.
Beast-Punishing Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target cannot recharge powers (save ends).
